tableSettings.title: Column settings
tableSettings.refreshTooltip: Reset individual table column settings to default

errorMessage.notificationError: The service has reported an error when processing this notification.
errorMessage.min: Please enter a number that is larger than: {{min}}.
errorMessage.max: Please enter a number that is smaller than: {{max}}.
errorMessage.minLength: Please enter a text that is larger than: {{minLength}}. Current: {{current}}
errorMessage.maxLength: Please enter a text that is smaller than: {{maxLength}}. Current: {{current}}
errorMessage.pattern: Please enter data that matches this pattern: {{- pattern}}.
errorMessage.maxDate: Please select a date that is before {{- maxDate}}.
errorMessage.minDate: Please select a date that is after {{- minDate}}.
errorMessage.currentDate: Please select a date that is after {{- currentDate}}.

unitTest.test01: This is for unit tests purposes.
unitTest.test02: This is for unit tests purposes. {{test}}

commonInvestigation.discardMessage: Your selection and input will be lost. To continue working on your investigation, click "Resume".
commonInvestigation.noInvestigationsDescription: If there are any quality investigations, they will be displayed here.

modal.failedDecline: Investigation failed to decline, please try again.
